name: GravityWorld
description:
A small endless runner where you reverse the gravity to avoid the obstacles. The mechanics are still in development and will be worked on later in the development process.

Currently there are only a few obstacles, but these will be expanded and also different level designs will be added as well as better high scoring and boosters/items.

Available Input Options:

  • Controller
  • Keyboard/Mouse

Planned Updates:

  • Sounds
  • Mechanic refinement
  • Better highscoring
  • Graphics replacement
  • Different regions/Levels
  • Better Level creation/randomization
